parameters.command:
=COURSE="{{ $json.courseName }}"
ARCHIVE="/data/shared/tmp/${COURSE}.tar.gz"
SRC="/data/shared/cursos/${COURSE}"
mkdir -p /data/shared/tmp
rm -f "$ARCHIVE"
if [ ! -d "$SRC" ]; then
  >&2 echo "Curso n√£o encontrado: $SRC"
  exit 1
fi
>&2 echo "üì¶ Comprimindo: $COURSE"
tar -czf "$ARCHIVE" -C "/data/shared/cursos" "$COURSE"
SIZE=$(stat -f%z "$ARCHIVE" 2>/dev/null || stat -c%s "$ARCHIVE")
>&2 echo "‚úÖ Arquivo criado: $(echo $SIZE | awk '{print $1/1024/1024 "MB"}')"
printf "$ARCHIVE"

parameters.query:
INSERT INTO course_uploads (course_name, drive_file_id, uploaded_at)
VALUES ('{{ $json.courseName }}', '{{ $json.id }}', NOW())
ON CONFLICT (course_name) DO UPDATE 
SET drive_file_id = EXCLUDED.drive_file_id, uploaded_at = NOW();
